document_data.mainbody: '''"The Curse of Tegea"''' is a short story by [[Troy Denning]] included in the 1993 anthology ''[[Realms of Valor]]''. The story features characters from the [[Avatar series]].
document_data.Summary: Two clerics of [[Mystra]] enter the village of [[Tegea]] in hopes of lifting the curse that affects the area. The clerics need not only face the source of the evil, but their inner selves too.
